boardgame.name: Aeon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s End: Legacy
boardgame.description: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;You are not breach mages yet,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; Brama lectures as she paces down the line of students, her frail form belying her immense power. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Breach mages have protected us since the beginning _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; since the burning of the world and our pilgrimage into the dark. It was they who founded Gravehold, our last bastion, and if you wish to stand beside these living legends, you must listen and learn. The Nameless shall come again, as they always have, and you will need to be ready. You are the hope of our future._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As a young apprentice, you grew up to stories of the breach mages. Brama, the teacher, wisest of the mages. Dezmodia, the prodigy, master of great magic. Mist, the stoic leader and tactical genius. Malastar, the magical craftsman. Rebellious, powerful, and reckless perfectly sum up Xaxos. These mages are your heroes and tomorrow, after your ordeal, you will join their ranks._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Each of you must overcome your ordeal to learn discipline and focus, the tools you will need to defend Gravehold. We are nothing without Gravehold. To be a breach mage is to sacrifice your life for Gravehold. When you die, it will be in defense of our city. Once you understand this universal truth...only then will you be ready to become a breach mage._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Aeon's End is not required to play Aeon's End: Legacy._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Aeon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s End: Echo Stone and Splinter Missile Promo

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: KS version. Will change to your address to receive when it ships to backers. I paid $65, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll pay $60 (shipping included).
New in shrink Kickstarter edition Includes the following: - Aeons End Legacy - Aeons End Buried Secrets Expansions - Aeons End Kickstarter exclusive pack Shipping should be around $13 USD

Kickstarter Edition which includes Aeon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s End Legacy core game, Buried Secrets Expansion, and all other unlocked stretch goals. Game is still shrink wrapped. All games come from a private collection (non-smoking and pet-free environment). Shipping: All shipping is done via DHL. Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within Germany I prefer the standard-bank-tranfer (IBAN). It is fast and causes no fees. Also payment via Bitcoin is possible. Outside Germany Paypal (friend transfer), Bitcoin and bank-transfer are possible.
